Title: Anti-pattern Mutations and Fault-proneness
Elements_risk_assessment: They assume that the bug fixing commit was caused by a bug
UseOF-SZZ: to identify fault fix locations and investigate the fault proneness of anti-pattern mutations.
Summary:
the paper presents results from an empirical study aimed at understanding
the evolution of anti-patterns in 27 releases of three open-source
software systems
Outcome:
(1)anti-patterns mutate from one type of anti-patterns to another, (2) structural
changes are behind these mutations, and (3) some mutations are
more risky in terms of fault-proneness.
